name: Marill
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: The end of its tail serves as a buoy that keeps it from drowning, even in a vicious current.

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Marill during your opponent’s next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Bubble Bomb
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, Marril does 10 damage to itself.
